animeTitle: Chibi Neko Tomu no Daibouken: Chikyuu wo Sukue! Nakama-tachi
animeDescription: Anime adaptation of children's stories "The Adventures of Tom the small Cat" by Masumi Lino (飯野真澄) (Story) and Yumiko Imai (今井弓子) (Illustrations).
animeStaff: [['Nakamura Ryuutarou', ['Director', 'Script', 'Storyboard', 'Series Composition']], ['Shiba Shigeharu', ['Sound Director']], ['Kawai Kenji', ['Music']], ['Okiura Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']]]
